snippet: The L.P.G.A. announced that the Lotte Championship would be played on Oahu in mid-April, ending a two-year absence in the state.
abstract: LPGA announces that the Lotte Championship will be played on Oahu, marking tour's return to Hawaii after two-year absence.
lead_paragraph: The L.P.G.A. announced that the Lotte Championship would be played on Oahu in mid-April, ending a two-year absence in the state.
